title: Thresh in just about EVERY game is getting incredibly stale.
body: It's been like this for just about as long as I remember. Hook, Flay, Prison, Lantern. The lane bullying. The late game hook that ends it. The cheese kill, the cheese escape. The 53% win rate. The absolute dominance. Does he have a counter? No. Does he determine the out come of games consistently. Yes. Give us a break Rito.

thresh is outclassed by any other support when it comes to one given thing, but that was the idea. he is only considered **the best support** because with skill he can overcome that inherit weakness. making his success based on the player and how capable the enemy team is with dealing with him. he is the "slayer" of supports and IMO there is nothing wrong with him functioning as such as he brings interesting an dynamic game play

unlike other supports who either just brick wall you or bully you into submission

Janna ONLY peels, and thus she can't make a lead well, which is more important now that games end at around 30 minutes on average.

Karma doesn't have better engage or disengage than Thresh. Only thing she has on him is harass and aoe shielding.

Thresh is a solid generalist pick, but some supports aren't good enough at what they do or what they do isn't really the best thing to do in the first place, so yeah, Thresh is gonna do well against a Leona or Karma. Janna kinda peels off anything he does, but he can just hook Janna herself or roam, leaving Janna to just float around. Not saying he needs immediate nerfs, but I am saying there's a reason he's pretty strong right now.

I don't recall claiming Thresh was OP. Anyways, you can dodge hooks until you're blue but he has two other powerful CC abilities. Blitzcrank can hook, but he can't peel, and it doesn't set up an engage as much as it does a pick. Thresh can shield, and peel, and whisk someone away. CY@ Janna, Braum, Blitzcrank, Bard, and others. Thresh can become a considerable brawler if bot lane comes ahead, because falling behind isn't already challenging enough. Now you have to fight a brawler with more CC than just about anyone and an ADC. Need a tank? Thresh can do that. It's ridiculous. He's not OP, just about everyone else is subpar in Solo Queue if proficiency levels are equal compared to him. Anyways the point of this thread wasn't to ask for nerfs. It was as I said in the title to point out how stale it is seeing Thresh in EVERY game unless I ban him. JACK OF ALL TRADES, MASTER OF ALL.

Its almost as if {{champion:412}}, out of 140+ champions, fulfills the correct amount of tanky-ness, damge, AND cc. He can engage, save allies with shields and re-position them, hook and pull a target, displace enemies in team fights, provide 5 large walls with great slows which are good for team-fights, chasing and retreating. 
He also gains power as things die and, if you so chose, you can build him as Combat Thresh and his whole kit supports it. Fairly beefy still, has a gap closer, slow, and displacer.
